triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs form the core computational foundation for the proposed AI system for EVA mission planning.

triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: RAG is explicitly mentioned in the paper title and used to augment the LLM with domain-specific knowledge.

triples.name: A* search algorithm
triples.relevance: A* path planning is explicitly mentioned and used to generate efficient EVA routes.

triples.name: Extravehicular activity
triples.relevance: EVA is the primary mission domain being addressed for autonomous decision support and planning.

triples.name: Knowledge graph
triples.relevance: Knowledge graphs support the structured representation and retrieval of EVA domain expertise.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: The multimodal user interface component processes diverse data types for mission planning communication.

triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: Motion and path planning techniques are fundamental to generating feasible EVA traverse routes.

triples.name: Energy expenditure
triples.relevance: Metabolic models for energy expenditure underpin the hypogravity metabolic predictions in RASAGE.

triples.name: Decision support system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an LLM-based decision support system for Earth-independent EVA mission planning.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: The agentic orchestration layer enables autonomous decision-making and task execution for mission planning.

triples.name: Space exploration
triples.relevance: Deep-space exploration missions are the target application domain for the proposed system's autonomy features.
